block_comment: The block computes the nominal Round Trip Time (RTT). Depending on the input value "rtt", the function computes the RTT as a fractional division of a predefined parameter RZQ. It uses a case structure to handle various input possibilities, dividing RZQ by four if "rtt" equals one, two if "rtt" equals two, and so forth. If the "rtt" is outside the case limits, the default function value is zero.
